name: RequestBuilder_buildPublicRequestTest
description: Unit tests for the buildPublicRequest method in the RequestBuilder class.

test_cases.name: testBuildPublicRequest_GET
test_cases.description: Tests the buildPublicRequest method with a GET request, ensuring the URL and method are correctly set.

test_cases.name: testBuildPublicRequest_InvalidMethod
test_cases.description: Tests the buildPublicRequest method with an invalid HTTP method, expecting a BinanceConnectorException to be thrown.

test_cases.name: testBuildPublicRequest_InvalidUrl
test_cases.description: Tests the buildPublicRequest method with an invalid URL, expecting a BinanceConnectorException to be thrown.
